ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join the Apple Maps Special Projects Team to shape the future of Apple Maps in a team of scientists and SW engineers!

ul.li: 1-2 years of experience in C, C++, Rust, Swift, or equivalent system level languages.
Experience on client-side or server backend applications.
Experience with development on Linux, macOS, iOS, or similar UNIX-like OS.
Ability to work on open-ended research projects.
Interest to collaborate with scientists on implementing new algorithms in the areas of machine learning, data mining, statistics, routing and computational geometry

div.p: You will be a key member of a team that is pursuing future products that will use Apple maps. In that role, you will be expected to think out-of-the-box, collaborate with scientists to implement a set of research hypotheses into prototypes for potential products.
- BS or MS in Computer Science

Preferred, but not necessary: - Familiarity with Geo Spatial data or computational geometry - Experience with Dijkstra, A* or other graph algorithms - Experience with spatial data structures such as quad trees and R* trees
